summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the core functionality of a basic internationalization message extractor, covering template tag handling, comment parsing, context extraction, error and warning reporting, locale enforcement, file discovery, gettext version detection, PO file encoding updates, special character handling, Unicode support, and configuration flags.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the i18n extraction process within the application, preventing regressions and ensuring accurate translation message collection across diverse scenarios.
